thread.title: Sony Pictures Settles Employee Class Action Over Hack

author: Ben Fritz
title: Sony Pictures Settles Employee Class Action Over Hack
text:
Sony Pictures Entertainment has agreed to pay up to $8 million and provide two additional years of identity theft protection as part of a settlement of a class-action lawsuit following last yearâ€™s cyberattack.
The settlement covers all current and former employees of the Sony Corp.-owned film and television studio, as well as others whose personal information was disclosed when hackers, believed to be connected to the North Korean... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
